description:
Taroutachi, who is tall even for a Sword Warrior, has trouble with his size in his day-to-day life. In the midst of the hot summer, Mutsunokami comes up with a different kind of sparring to help everyone cool down.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nagatsuki: Tama ni wa Ii Desu ne...
長月 たまにはいいですね...
